page.title: 17A DAY IN LIFE OF 1985
page.content: I get up about 8.OOa.m. and put on my school uniform. I go downstairs and have my breakfast. Some days I have toast, others it is cereal foods. After breakfast I get my bag ready for school. My parents take me to school in our car which is a champagne coloured Escort Ghia, arriving there at about 8.55a.m. During the school day I do lessons such as English, Maths., Topics, reading and games. We have three playtimes a day including the lunch break. At 3.35p.m. the bell rings for home time. I usually get home around 4.OOp.m. and switch the television on to watch childrens' programmes until about 5.3Op.m. Then I have my tea after which I go to play out with my friends. I come back in at about 9.OOp.m. and go to bed at 1O.3Op.m.
